data.message: Your new Events page layout is terrible. I want to be able to easily see my events, not be forced to look at sponsored events. Calendar view is the only way to see my stuff and that's a lousy way to format that feature.

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Audra. We’re working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone’s Facebook experience. Please let us know how we can make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2dvSGgk. -Jessica
Facebook I agree! I cannot even find the events I created! All I see are suggested events and everything else.
my Events are from the wrong city..doubt that problem will ever get fixed..how about making Facebook more enjoyable by allowing users to easily change things?? hmmm
